DOC.brief_summary: This study blind randomize trial compare two different dos interval buccal misoprostol cervical preparation surgical abortion 13 16 week ' gestation : 400 mcg administer 3 hour D & E ( dilation extraction ) , 600 mcg administer 1.5 hour D & E . Primary objective : To compare operative time two different dos interval misoprostol use non-inferiority design . Secondary objective : To compare dos interval misoprostol difference : ( 1 ) initial cervical dilation ; ( 2 ) need mechanical dilation ease dilation require ; ( 3 ) ability complete abortion procedure without cervical preparation ; ( 4 ) complication ; ( 5 ) provider variable include ease procedure satisfaction cervical preparation ; ( 6 ) patient variable include pre-operative side effect , post-operative pain , acceptability
DOC.brief_title: Misoprostol Dose Timing Before Surgical Abortion 13 16 Weeks ' Gestation : Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Eligible pregnancy termination Planned Parenthood NYC Able give inform consent English speaking Reports active bleeding , severe pain , symptoms spontaneous labor enrollment Intrauterine fetal demise identify preoperative ultrasound Allergy misoprostol
